SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER() AS RN ,T1.POST_ID ,T1.POST_TYPE ,( SELECT A1.CODE_NAME FROM TB_COMMON_CODE A1 WHERE A1.CODE_CD = T1.POST_TYPE AND A1.CODE_TYPE = 'POST_TYPE' ) AS POST_TYPE_NAME ,T1.POST_CATEGORY_ID ,(SELECT A1.CATEGORY_NAME FROM TB_BLOG_CATEGORY A1 WHERE A1.CATEGORY_ID = T1.POST_CATEGORY_ID) AS POST_CATEGORY_NAME ,T1.POST_TITLE ,T1.POST_CONTENT ,T1.EVENT_START_TIME ,T1.EVENT_END_TIME ,T1.POST_THUMBNAIL_SMALL ,T1.POST_THUMBNAIL_BIG ,T1.POST_AUTHOR ,T1.IS_JOIN ,T1.IS_NEED_PAY ,T1.POST_PRICE ,T1.STATUS ,CASE WHEN T1.STATUS = 1 THEN '使用中' WHEN T1.STATUS = 0 THEN '禁用' ELSE '-' END AS STATUS_NAME ,T1.OPTION01 ,T1.OPTION02 ,T1.OPTION03 ,T1.OPTION04 ,T1.OPTION05 ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS CREATE_TIME ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS UPDATE_TIME FROM TB_POST T1
AND (IFNULL(#{postTitle}, '') = '' OR T1.POST_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{postTitle}, '%') )
AND (IFNULL(#{postAuthor}, '') = '' OR T1.POST_AUTHOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{postAuthor}, '%') )
AND (IFNULL(#{isJoin}, '') = '' OR T1.IS_JOIN = #{isJoin})
AND T1.STATUS = #{status}
AND T1.POST_TYPE = #{postType}
AND T1.EVENT_START_TIME >= STR_TO_DATE(#{eventStartTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND T1.EVENT_END_TIME >= STR_TO_DATE(#{eventEndTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY T1.CREATE_TIME DESC
